name: Underground Lake
description: An underground lake provides fresh water in otherwise dry areas, but the darkness and unknown depths create dangerous swimming conditions. The water can support unique blind creatures, while the surrounding caverns may contain valuable minerals or ancient ruins.
atmosphere: Mysterious body of water hidden beneath surface. World of darkness and unknown depths. Cool air scented of fresh water, earth, and hidden secrets. Absolute darkness creates mystery and danger. Unknown depths hide blind creatures or treasures. Surrounding caverns may contain valuable minerals or ancient ruins.
